rukus.text: Hini na nina bakholwayo! Musani ukuvumela ubutyebi benu nabantwana benu baniphambukise eNdleleni ka-Allâh, nabani na owenza oko, abo ngabona bangabalahlekelwa

Nikelani ke eNdleleni ka-Allâh koko Sininike kona phambi kokuba ukufa kufikele omnye wenu, aze athi: “Nkosi yam akwaba Ubunokukhe Undimele ixeshana elifutshane ukuze ndinikele kumalizo ndibe ngomnye wamalungisa.”
Kodwa (Yena) uAllâh Akasokuze Awumele umphefumlo xa sele lifikile ixesha lawo. Kananjalo uAllâh Unolwazi ngoko nikwenzayo
